snippet.title: Arcade Game: Freeze (1984 Cinematronics)
snippet.description:
A Maze/Shooting 'em up Game where an astronaut trapped in Arctic. He must go in the Cavern Holes to search for crystal gems to not only recharge his jetpack and flamepower, but also refill his energy and fuel in his ship to escape. He must use his flamethrower to kill any dangerous creatures getting in his way.

Note: Used infinite lives cheat after down to last life. The game is endless so I quit afterwards.
